alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Kingsbury; Lake (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 7:27PM MDT until August 10 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kingsbury County in east central South Dakota... Northern Lake County in east central South Dakota... Southwestern Brookings County in east central South Dakota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oldham, or 13 miles southeast of Lake Thompson State Recreation Area, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ramona around 830 PM CDT. Nunda around 835 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
